creditline: Gift of Harriet and Ed Spencer
dimension:
42 1/4 x 16 1/8 in. (107.32 x 40.96 cm) (image)
76 1/8 x 21 7/16 in. (193.36 x 54.45 cm) (overall, without roller)
medium: Hanging scroll, left of a pair, ink and color on silk
object_name: hanging scroll, one of a pair
text: This pair of hanging scrolls is the product of a collaboration between two related Kyoto artists. The tiger is by Ganku and the dragon by his son-in-law and principal student, Kishi Renzan.
title: Tiger [left of a pair of Tiger and Dragon]
